==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Pacha}}'' is an {{w|Andean}} cosmological concept and literally means "place" in {{w|Quechua}}, but can also refer to time. ''Hanan Pacha'', literally meaning "upper place," is interpreted as a cosmological realm where cosmic objects reside.
